text: Mark Knowles and Daniel Nestor were the defending champions, but lost in semifinals to Todd Woodbridge and Mark Woodforde. Jonas Björkman and Byron Black won the title, by defeating Woodbridge and Woodforde 6–3, 7–6(8–6) in the final. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ATP) * Official results archive (ITF) Doubles
title: 1999 Great American Insurance ATP Championships – Doubles
